doc.name: Sequencer
doc.description: This actor takes a sequence of inputs tagged with a sequence number and produces them on the output port in the order given by the sequence number. The sequence numbers are integers starting with zero. On each firing, this actor consumes one token from the input port and one token from the sequenceNumber port. If the sequence number is the next one in the sequence, then the token read from the input port is produced on the output port. Otherwise, it is saved until its sequence number is the next one in the sequence. If an output is produced, then it may be immediately followed by tokens that were previously saved, if their sequence numbers are next.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.port: Input for the sequence number. The type is int.
doc.property: The first number of the sequence. This is an int that defaults to 0.
